transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan. Good morning sir, Rahul baat kar raha hu India WhatsApp account manager.
Customer: Yaar abhi baat nahi kar paunga mai. Thodi der ke baad karenge? Ek aadha ghante ke baad call back kar lu sir?
Executive: Ek dedh ghante ke baad baate karte hai hum log.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul aapko 12 baje call karta hu sir.
Executive: Haan mai abhi thoda dusre kaam me busy hu. Baad me phone karta hu. Haan mai aapko 12 baje call back karta hu sir.
Customer: Haan thik hai try kar lo ek baar 12 baje mil jayenge. Thik hai. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is busy and cannot talk immediately.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call back later.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

call back, time
